cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 320 mi SSW of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northward, then turning NNE across the southeastern U.S. toward the Mid-Atlantic and exiting off the Delaware/New Jersey coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch/Tropical Storm Watch only along the Louisiana coast west of Morgan City
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to the MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning eastward to Walton/Bay County Line FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from Louisiana to Florida, then inland across MS, AL, GA and northeast through the Carolinas to the Mid-Atlantic including Delaware and New Jersey
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts (35–45 mph) possible late Thu into early Fri
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected above minor tidal departures along Delaware Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rain bands 2–4 inches with localized higher totals causing ponding and minor river rises
weather_observation.other_hazards: Brief reduced visibility and possible minor debris from gusty winds
